tweet: My 95 yr old grandma's private insurance does NOT cover the cost of her LTC. We'd have to pay $300 out of pocket every day (to a nursing home) just to keep her alive. She's more comfortable at home but the emotional burden is enormous on my beloved mother. #MedicareForAll now.
